answers.answer: It sounds like she may have diabetes,  jen.    Pretty classic symptoms,  as well as the behavioral issues in unchecked juvenile diabetes.

The answer here is to take her to the Doctor and ask him what is going on, most of the remedies  have to be prescribed anyway , seek some help.Also check out what is happening in her life if she is at day care does it have fun games do they stimulate the children enough, the symptoms you describe could be caused by being upset.Get her checked out .
I too, would have her checked for diabetes.  The constant thirst is concerning.
